alert.note: Alert for Coshocton; Guernsey; Monroe; Muskingum; Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 5:53PM EDT until May 03 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Guernsey County in east central Ohio... Northwestern Monroe County in east central Ohio... Coshocton County in east central Ohio... Muskingum County in east central Ohio... Central Noble County in east central Ohio... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 553 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Harbor Hills to near New Lexington, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Zanesville, Coshocton, Cambridge, Caldwell, New Concord, Byesville, West Lafayette, South Zanesville, North Zanesville, Dresden, Frazeysburg, and Philo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central Ohio. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
